title.value: A Framework for Fair Decision-making Over Time with Time-invariant Utilities
title.justification: The title is clearly stated at the beginning of the paper.
title.quote: A Framework for Fair Decision-making Over Time with Time-invariant Utilities

extractions.description: This paper addresses the challenge of achieving fairness in decision-making problems involving multiple stakeholders and a central decision maker making repeated decisions over time. It introduces a mathematical programming framework that focuses on fairness while preserving decision efficiency. The paper proposes a reformulation to mitigate complexity introduced by symmetry in such problems, enabling easier implementation of branch-and-cut solvers. A relaxed version of this reformulated problem is also introduced, providing approximate solutions quickly using simultaneous row and column generation techniques.

type.justification: The paper focuses on developing a mathematical programming framework and theoretical insights for fairness in decision-making over time rather than conducting empirical experiments.
type.quote: This paper examines repeated decisions on problems involving multiple stakeholders and a central decision maker. Repetition of the decision-making provides additional opportunities to promote fairness while increasing the complexity from symmetry to finding solutions.

name.justification: The paper discusses optimization of fairness in decision-making problems and proposes mathematical programming frameworks.
name.quote: This paper presents a general mathematical programming framework for the proposed fairness-over-time (FOT) decision-making problem.

name.justification: The focus on mathematical programming and decision-making relates closely to Operations Research.
name.quote: Choosing a good alternative from a given (discrete or continuous) set of alternatives has been the central concept underlying numerous decision-making problems.

name.justification: The paper addresses fairness in decision-making, which is a key concern in the field of Fairness in Machine Learning.
name.quote: Fairness is a major concern in contemporary decision problems.
